name: The Slime Slayer
description:
The Slime Slayer is all about to not be killed, you will be killed if a slime jumps on you. The longer you live the stronger you get. You will get a weapon if you kill some slimes. The only way at first to kill slimes is to jump on them.

Controls: Attack with sword - Space

WASD or arrow keys to move

Please rate my game on Ludum Dare: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/the-slime-slayer

Start With Nothing:

You start with nothing, not even clotch. And you will get better the longer you stay alive.
